name: Tile King
description:
You are the new king of the barren Land of Tiles, for as long as you can keep paying  that is. 

Tile King is a chill tile building game. Your goal is to survive as long as possible by  gathering enough gold to make payments every ten turns. To do this, you must harvest the natural resources by constructing different building on top of the different types of tiles. Beware the ever increasing costs to both building and your payments.

Controls:

LMB: Select and Build Tiles

RMB: Trade at a Shop and Cancel Building

Middle Mouse: Drag Screen

Made for LD52: Harvest

A game by MiltonNH25 with additional art by Choco
